PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-08362008-05-08,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActPension Benefits Standards Act, 1985
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE PENSION BENEFITS STANDARDS REGULATIONS, 1985 by improving the quality of life of some individuals with federally-regulated Life Income Funds and locked-in Registered Retirement Savings Plans by increasing the flexibility they have to manage these assets to meet their needs, while at the same time maintaining the security of their retirement incomes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0144 Publication Date: 2008-05-28
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: REGULATIONS AMENDING THE PENSION BENEFITS STANDARDS REGULATIONS, 1985 by improving the quality of life of some individuals with federally-regulated Life Income Funds and locked-in Registered Retirement Savings Plans by increasing the flexibility they have to manage these assets to meet their needs, while at the same time maintaining the security of their retirement incomes.
